statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Isaac Williams scored 28 points, Marcus Romain added 23, and Mississippi Valley State sent Arkansas-Pine Bluff to its sixth straight loss with an 88-77 win on Saturday night.
article.headline: Mississippi Valley State tops Arkansas-Pine Bluff 88-77
article.linkText: Mississippi Valley State tops Arkansas-Pine Bluff 88-77
article.story: ITTA BENA, Miss. -- Isaac Williams scored 28 points, Marcus Romain added 23, and Mississippi Valley State sent Arkansas-Pine Bluff to its sixth straight loss with an 88-77 win on Saturday night. Williams made 4 of 6 3-pointers and 10 of 14 overall for Mississippi Valley State (7-24, 7-11 Southwestern Athletic), which ended the regular season on a three-game win streak. Romain finished 12 of 14 from the free-throw line. TaJay Henry and Rashaan Surles added 15 points apiece. The Delta Devils made 16 of 17 from the line in the first half en route to a 44-36 lead at the break. A layup from Henry with 17:04 left put Mississippi Valley State up 52-42, and the lead remained in double figures, reaching as high as 19. Jaquan Lynch was 12 of 12 from the free-throw line and scored 24 points for Arkansas-Pine Bluff (7-24, 6-12). Ghiavonni Robinson added 14 points and Charles Jackson made 4 of 5 3-pointers to finish with 12.
